themes: clarity and transparency in grant opportunities
key_phrases: more clearly naming grant opportunities under the specific programs
include historical and projected budgets in evaluation
encourages and allows orgs to come off of City funding for periods of time
establish a PARTNERSHIP system instead of a PATRONAGE system
barriers_identified: lack of clarity in grant opportunities
current patronage model limits community contribution expectations
solutions_proposed: more clearly naming grant opportunities under the specific programs
include historical and projected budgets in evaluation
allow organizations to come off City funding for periods of time
establish a partnership system instead of a patronage system
